 bluewizman

Do not go to sleep! 

The tea is cursed! Alas!

As Frankleskas quickly approaches I would like to officially nominate my friend The Blue Wizard for the High Council of Wizards' Spell of the Year Award 🫡

His enchanted kettles are absolutely incredible, if you haven't gotten one yet I suggest you snag one before they're gone 🏃
I would nominate you for People's Choice Wizard also but that one's not up to me 😁😘

What evil have you wrought?? 

If Merv does not awaken, I swear by the Staff of Aperalionathornialiead that there shall be swift justice dealt.

Whoaa why are you so steamed?

Is the pressure getting to you?

The whole village loves these BW-branded kettles, there's one in every home -- simmer down and enjoy this great success!
toot

- in the autumn only except if you fertilise toot with a well aerated compost mixture that is heavy on the vermiculite toooootTOOTteetoot which is best sourced from a pasture that contained grazing ungulates no more recently than teeTOOTooTOOT two score years and 13, an auspicious number if you ask-

-a variety of authorities on the matter toot toot toot including myself toot as toot a matter of toot fact but that depends frankly on who you ask because some TOOT indeed think they know a little TOO much toot more than they think, a particularly ironic and troubling toot tendency - to always igno-

Why not have some tea, I know you want to and then take a nice long little nap with a deep breath there it is just trust tha-

This morning I ran the full length of the Yontish River.

I was trying to focus on my form but that river is incorrigible! I was laughing so hard I couldn't see the ground!

⚠️HCW EMERGENCY ALERT⚠️

The High Council of Wizards is receiving some disturbing reports this morning regarding strange and potentially dangerous behaviour from home appliances 

Details are scarce and it's too early to make any assumptions about what's happening -- please remain calm

1/2

Did the Blue Wizard recently enchant thousands of kettles and give them away? 

Yes. 

Does that make any sense economically? 

No.

Could there be any other motive for wanting these kettles in every home? 

Unclear.

So far there's 0 evidence to suggest he had anything to do with this fiasco!
